com.mygdx.game.gameLogic.Characters

Class Hero

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.mygdx.game.gameLogic.Characters.Entity
      • com.mygdx.game.gameLogic.Characters.Character
        • com.mygdx.game.gameLogic.Characters.Hero
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    CharacterInfo, HeroInfo
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    HeroLifesWrapper

    public class Hero
extends Character
implements HeroInfo
    Class that represents the player controlled character.

    • Method Detail

      • setXMovement

        public void setXMovement(double d)
        Method that makes the hero move on the X axis. d is multiplied by the max speed of the hero to obtain the speed of the hero on the X axis.
        Parameters:
        d - goes form -1.0 to 1.0, with d < 0.0 menaing moving the hero left, d > 0.0 moving the hero right and d ==0.0 hero not moving

      • isMoving

        public boolean isMoving()
        Returns:
        true if hero is moving on X axis or jumping (moving on Y axis)

      • jump

        public void jump(double gravityStrength)
        makes the hero character jump into the Y axis. Te movement along the Y axis follows a parabollic path (jump with gravity). The hero is shot into the Y axis with a speed and is then that speed is then subtracted on each pollOrientation.
        Parameters:
        gravityStrength - strength of the gravity that determines how much the hero is slowed down. should go from aorund 0.5 to 1.0

      • fall

        public void fall(double gravityStrength)
        Allows the hero to fall from platform. Same as jump method only without an initial thrust on the Y axis.
        Parameters:
        gravityStrength - determines the strenght of the gravity, same as in the jump method.

      • getYAcceleration

        private double getYAcceleration(double gravityStrength)

      • stopJump

        public void stopJump()
        Stops the hero's movement on the Y axis (juming and falling).

      • update

        public void update(float deltaT)
        Specific pollOrientation method for Hero class. updates speed on Y axis when jumping or falling is in progress. and has specific animation time logic.
        Overrides:
        update in class Character
        Parameters:
        deltaT - tiem in seconds

      • isJumping

        public boolean isJumping()
        Specified by:
        isJumping in interface HeroInfo
        Returns:
        true if hero is jumping (either the upwards or downwards part)

      • isMovingRight

        public boolean isMovingRight()
        Specified by:
        isMovingRight in interface CharacterInfo
        Overrides:
        isMovingRight in class Character
        Returns:
        true if hero if facing the right direction

      • checkCollision

        public boolean checkCollision(Entity en)
        Check if the hero collides with entity en. The collisions arent checked at hero borders but a bit towards the center.
        Overrides:
        checkCollision in class Entity
        Parameters:
        en - the object to test against for collisions.
        Returns:
        true if there is a collision, false otherwise
